source_objects.description: Discover new how-to projects and learn advice from other do-it-yourselfers to fix up your home.
source_objects.title: Home Improvement & Gardening

items.title: Woodworking: All About Wood

visible_instructors.title: George Vondriska
visible_instructors.job_title: Managing Editor & Instructor of Woodworkers Guild of America
visible_instructors.name: George

items.headline: This extensive course on wood will help you gain a better understanding of what to use for various projects.
objectives_summary: This woodworking course provides many important tips & to help you choose the right material for your project.
The difference between various woods to help you understand what you are working with.
How to incorporate wood defects into your project.

items.title: 5 garden crops for food storage
items.headline: Learn gardening for self sufficiency by growing your own food storage crops
objectives_summary: Grow the 5 best crops that will help you fill your food storage
Learn how to grow each of the 5 best food storage crops
Learn the best methods for preserving your food storage crops

items.title: How to set up an Hydroponic Garden
items.headline: Hydroponics for Beginners
objectives_summary: You will learn how to set up a garden according to principles of hydroponics

items.title: Declutter your bedroom (de-clutter, decluttering)
items.headline: Clear the clutter, find things, sleep better, feel happy
objectives_summary: Find things in your bedroom quickly and easily
Have a place for everything and everything in its place
Sleep well

items.title: Online Bonsai Course
items.headline: A Beginners Guide to Create Miniature Beauties
objectives_summary: Basic and intermediate techniques for cultivating Bonsai from start to end
A relaxing and entertaining hobby you can practice at home
Horticulture and Art at the same time

items.title: Gardening - Indoor Seed Starting Engineered for Simplicity

visible_instructors.title: Gene Black
visible_instructors.job_title: Gardener, Beekeeper, IT Infrastructure and Network Engineer
visible_instructors.name: Gene

items.headline: Successfully start seeds inside to produce plants for your garden using a method designed to minimize work and cost.
objectives_summary: Correctly determine which plants to start inside from seed.
Choose suitable containers for indoor seed starting.
Select appropriate soil for indoor seed starting.

items.title: Solar and Home Energy Storage, NV14
items.headline: Energy Storage is needed to use the Solar Systems for critical loads when the Grid goes down.
objectives_summary: Learn How important Home Energy Storage Systems are for Solar Systems
When the Utility Grid goes down, Solar Systems stop without a Home Energy Storage System
It is estimated that 20% of the Solar Systems installed in 2020 will have Energy Storage

items.title: Minimalist Lifestyle - Complete Course - Decluttering Life
items.headline: Learn Minimalism for your home, office and life. Minimalist interior design for all facets of your life and career
objectives_summary: Minimalist Lifestyle
Decluttering
Interior Design

items.title: Basic Home Electrical Wiring by Example and On the Job
items.headline: The Basic Fundamentals of Home Electrical Wiring, with Wiring Diagrams and Detailed Examples.
objectives_summary: How electricity is generated and enters the home.
Electrical safety, theory, and basic wiring methods.
How to select and use the right tools and testers for the job.

items.title: Woodworking: Fundamentals of Furniture Making

visible_instructors.title: George Vondriska
visible_instructors.job_title: Managing Editor & Instructor of Woodworkers Guild of America
visible_instructors.name: George

items.headline: This extensive furniture making course will help improve skills resulting in rock solid furniture.
objectives_summary: This woodworking course provides every detail you need to build quality furniture in your shop.
Learn the mortise and tenon joint resulting in solid furniture.
Adding decorative accents to furniture projects taking it from simple to beautiful.

items.title: Comprehensive Home Repair and Improvement
items.headline: Everything you need to know to tackle nearly any home repair or improvement project yourself
objectives_summary: How to identify and properly use a range of hand and power tools, and which ones you should own
Basic electrical concepts
How to work with and install electrical devices such as outlets, switches and fixtures

items.title: The Essential BioDynamics: Partner With Universe
items.headline: GROW a Robust Farm, Benefit Your Health & Environment- SimPLy Apply Cosmos' Energetic Interactions with Planet Earth
objectives_summary: WHAT IS BIODYNAMICS, How To Apply The Beautiful, Surprising Simplicity of Universal Energetics, to Human, Farm and Biological Life
HOW EVERY HUMAN, Regardless of Education, Philosophy, or Cultural Background, Can Easily Embrace Biodynamics Principles
LEARN the Cosmic Rhythms, This Reliable, Repeating Dance between Moon, Earth, Sun and Outer Cosmos

items.title: Beginner's Guide to Gardening: Building Raised Beds

visible_instructors.title: Sunny Green
visible_instructors.job_title: Management Consultant, Early Retiree, Urban Farmer
visible_instructors.name: Sunny

items.headline: Get gardening with this step-by-step guide to building a raised bed garden.
objectives_summary: How to build a raised bed with minimal materials, equipment, and cost.
Understand all the basic aspects of maintaining a raised bed garden: planting, watering, etc.
Knowledge of basic light carpentry concepts and how to apply them.

items.title: Permaculture Design for Conserving Water
items.headline: Using ecological design approach known as permaculture and showing how it can be used to create water-wise landscapes.
objectives_summary: Gain a general understanding of permaculture design and application.
Create water-wise landscapes in dry climates using permaculture techniques.

items.title: DIY - Build your own Shipping Container Home  in 2020 course

visible_instructors.name: Philip

items.headline: Learn the things to avoid and the things you must do when building your own shipping container home and save
objectives_summary: Avoid the 10 common mistake most people do when building with shipping containers
Apply the 10 thing every shipping container home must include

items.title: Patching Walls Like a Pro

visible_instructors.title: Steve Maxwell
visible_instructors.job_title: Learn Hands-On How-To Living Skills With Steve
visible_instructors.name: Steve

items.headline: Let home improvement mentor Steve Maxwell show you how to complete repairs on simple drywall issues before painting.
objectives_summary: Choose the essential tools and supplies for a drywall patching kit
Patch those pesky and annoying nail and screw holes in three quick steps
Fix drywall screw and nail pops at least as well as any professional drywaller
